name: bugiver
description: Bugiver is a simple website that iterates through everyone that you are following on GitHub and selects a random issue in a completely random repository in a language of your choice. I have designed it as my personal "I have nothing to do" button that gives me something to do in a possibly futile attempt to encourage myself to contribute to more repositories than I create.
author: James Fenn <18jafenn90@gmail.com> (https://jfenn.me/)
